channel.title: 24/7 HARDCORE PVP/Survival Minecraft Server
channel.description:
Come one! Come all!
My fairly new HARCORE PVP/Survival Server! Join and bring your friends along too, you can battle them in PVP! Or run from spawn and create your own base. But beware, hide your stuff well otherwise you could be raided!
IP: 115.178.17.6
BRING EVERYONE TO PLAY!
